summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources; authorizing an agreement with the United States of America, Department of Health, Education and Welfare for financial assistance to continue the Veterans' Upward Bound Program (Grant No. OEG-0-73-0306) during the period July 1, 1974 to June 30, 1975, establishing the Program Category "Veterans' Upward Bound Program" and budget allowance therefor in the 1974 Budget of said Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor.
